START.title: Project Start and Overall WBS Definition
START.current_functionality_summary: This XML file represents the conceptual start of the Work Breakdown Structure for the RME-Qt migration project. It can serve as a root node in a project management view or as a placeholder for listing all major top-level tasks or phases. It does not correspond to a specific piece of code to be ported but rather to the overall project definition itself.
START.qt6_migration_steps: 1. Define all major task categories (BUILD, CORE, DATA (now part of CORE), DOCS, FINAL, LOGIC, NET, REFACTOR, RENDER, TEST, UI). 2. List all top-level WBS items (XML files) under their respective categories. 3. (Optional) Define project phases if applicable (e.g., Phase 1: Core Porting, Phase 2: UI Implementation, Phase 3: Testing & Finalization). 4. This file can be used by project management tools or scripts to get an overview of all defined tasks.
START.definition_of_done: - `START.XML` is created. - It provides a high-level overview or entry point for understanding the project's WBS structure. - (Optional) It lists major task categories or phases and references key top-level tasks.
START.boilerplate_coder_ai_prompt: Create the `START.XML` file. Its purpose is to be the root or entry point for the WBS. - Set `id: START` - Set `section: Project Management` - Set `title: Project Start and Overall WBS Definition` - Dependencies can include the very first task, e.g., `BUILD-00`. - The description fields should explain its role as a meta-task for project organization.
